sentences.en: A prophet made a prophecy that the kingdom would fall.
sentences.cn: 一位预言家预言那个王国将要灭亡.

sentences.en: After the old king died, his son ruled over the kingdom.
sentences.cn: 老国王死后, 他儿子统治这个王国.

sentences.en: Don't mention politics or we'll be here until kingdom come.
sentences.cn: 咱们别谈政治吧,否则一谈就没完没了.

sentences.en: He divided their kingdom into thirds.
sentences.cn: 他把他们的王国分成了三个部分。

sentences.en: He visited various penal institutions in the United Kingdom in the late 1930s.
sentences.cn: 20世纪30年代末他探访了英国各种各样的服刑机构。

sentences.en: I prize my library above my kingdom.
sentences.cn: 我把我的藏书看得比我的王国还珍贵.

sentences.en: Roger Kingdom set the world record of 12.92 seconds.
sentences.cn: 罗杰·金德姆创造了12.92秒的世界纪录。

sentences.en: Rome annexed the Nabatean kingdom in 106 AD.
sentences.cn: 公元106年罗马吞并了纳巴泰王国。
动物界/植物界/矿物界〔大自然三界〕

sentences.en: The Kingdom of Italy formally came into being on 17 March 1861.
sentences.cn: 意大利王国于1861年3月17日正式成立。

sentences.en: the truck was blown to kingdom come.
sentences.cn: 卡车被吹到未来世界去了。

sentences.en: This creature had the largest eyes in the whole animal kingdom.
sentences.cn: 这种动物在整个动物界中眼睛最大.

sentences.en: This is the fight of the kingdom of the mind.
This television program provoked a spirited debate in the United Kingdom.
sentences.cn: 这个电视节目在英国引起了激烈的辩论。

sentences.en: to be domiciled in the United Kingdom
Wales was a vassal kingdom at that time.
sentences.cn: 那时威尔士是个附庸国.

words.tran_cn: 国王的；高贵的，国王似的

phrases.tran_cn: 中央王国；中王国时代（古埃及十一王朝时期）
新王国；新王国时期（指公元前1580～前1085年间的埃及第18～20代王朝）

trans.tran_en: a country ruled by a king or queen
